name: TapClicks
description:
TapClicks, Inc. is a leading marketing technology company for agencies, media companies, brands, and enterprises.Â 
Its integrated Marketing Operations Platform includes sales enablement, workflow and order management, analytics, and automated reporting -- all within a single intuitive user interface available on demand in the cloud.
TapClicks has delivered over 1,000,000 dashboards to over 5,000 brands and over 500 media companies and agencies worldwide.
